let limitePlano = null;

function prepareExternalInterface(app) {
 app.addEventListener("sceneLoad", function(event) {
 const scene = event.scene;
 if (!scene) {
 console.error("No se encontró escena en sceneLoad");
 return;
 }

 limitePlano = scene.getObjectByName("LimitePlano");
 if (!limitePlano) {
 console.warn("No existe el objeto 'LimitePlano'. La limitación no funcionará.");
 }
 });
}

function runCode(app, puzzles) {
 function loop() {
 if (limitePlano) {
 const camera = app.viewer.camera;
 const origin = camera.position.clone();
 const direction = new v3d.Vector3(0, -1, 0);
 const raycaster = new v3d.Raycaster(origin, direction);
 const intersects = raycaster.intersectObject(limitePlano, true);
 if (intersects.length > 0 && intersects[0].distance < 1.0) {
 camera.position.y = limitePlano.position.y + 1.0;
 }
 }
 requestAnimationFrame(loop);
 }
 loop();
}

if (typeof window !== "undefined") {
 window.prepareExternalInterface = prepareExternalInterface;
 window.runCode = runCode;
}
